title: _GET_PED_HAIR_RGB_COLOR
content:
0x4852FC386E2E1BB5// GetPedHairRgbColor
void _GET_PED_HAIR_RGB_COLOR(int hairColorIndex, int* outR, int* outG, int* outB);Parameters:hairColorIndex: The hair color index. Value between 0-63 (inclusive).outR: Output red value.outG: Output green value.outB: Output blue value.Input: Haircolor index, value between 0 and 63 (inclusive).
Output: RGB values for the haircolor specified in the input.This is used with the hair color swatches scaleform.Use _0x013E5CFC38CD5387 to get the makeup colors.Old name:  _GET_HAIR_RGB_COLOR
codeBlocks:
// GetPedHairRgbColor
void _GET_PED_HAIR_RGB_COLOR(int hairColorIndex, int* outR, int* outG, int* outB);
